name: SSS Origins (English)
description: SSS Origins started as a private project, it tells the story of a friends group who met thanks to Pen Spinning, but with fantasy,  exageration, and Jotchuas (the dog from the memes) as protagonists, an RPG with real time battles made by a guy that likes a lot Pen Spinning, has some really good friends, and lots of time, it's just a simple game, I hope you enjoy it!
